titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, 29. 4. 1949
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 59f.).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your letter. It was forwarded to Vienna. This is only to say that I'm unable at present to write a proper letter. I am here because my eldest sister is ill. I intend to fly to England in 2 or 3 weeks. I'm very much looking forward to seeing you before long.
